description.value:
Starting when you choose this origin at 1st level, you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the Dragon Spells table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you. Once you gain a dragon spell, you always have it prepared, and it does not count against the number of spells you can prepare each day.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be an enchantment or a transmutation spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list.
